entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 34 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 34 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
